abstractTasks.description: If a card has a 3 on one side then it has a S on the other side.
abstractTasks.story: Each card has a number on one side and a letter on the other side.

abstractTasks.description: If a card has a S on one side then it has a 3 on the other side.
abstractTasks.story: Each card has a number on one side and a letter on the other side.

abstractTasks.description: If there is a vowel on one side then there is an even number on the other side.
abstractTasks.story: Each card has a number on one side and a letter on the other side.

abstractTasks.description: If a card is red on one side then the other side shows a consonant.
abstractTasks.story: Each card has a colour on one side and a letter on the other side.

concreteTasks.description: If a person drinks an alcoholic drink, then they must be over the age of 21 years old.
concreteTasks.story: You are a person working in a disco. The numbers on the cards correspond to a person's age. Each card has an age on one side and a drink on the other side.

concreteTasks.description: If a person drives a car, then they must be over the age of 18 years old.
concreteTasks.story: You are a policeman patrolling on the street. The numbers on the cards correspond to an age. Each card has a vehicle on one side and an age on the other side

concreteTasks.description: If a person owns a TV, she has to be other than 18 years.
concreteTasks.story: Each card has an electrical device on one side and an age on the other side.

concreteTasks.story: You are a policeman checking people in a bar.
